title: I need help to revert a setting-change i made back in the days
body:
For some reason i made the change that i can not click on the minimap without using "shift". So if i want to move the camera to the location i click on the minimap i have to hold "shift".
I would like to revert that but i dont know how.
I already tried the "reset setting to default" and also deleted the .cfg folder in c:/riotgames/leagueoflegends/config
but it only revert all other settings.. just not the one with "shift"

pls help :3

replies.body:
You may need to reset your config file to default in order to restore your settings to default.  Try the following steps to do that:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

I wouldn't recommend modifying files in the future as it can usually end up causing more trouble than good.  Hope that helps!
